Class JumpException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • JumpException

  • class JumpException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    A JumpException encapsulates a Throwable and its original backtrace, but allows nested exception handlers to add information to the JumpException while passing it out to the top-level.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Vector infos
      the accumulated infos
      protected java.lang.Throwable throwable
      the encapsulated Throwable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JumpException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      creates a new JumpException encapsulating a Throwable.
      JumpException(java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.lang.String info)
      creates a new JumpException with an info encapsulating a Throwable.
